# Azure Data Engineering Course - Landing Page Project

## Project Overview
Next.js 14 landing page for UpSkill Academy's Azure Data Engineering course with premium design, smooth animations, and modern UI.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Framer Motion for animations
- React Icons

## Progress Tracking
- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Scaffold Next.js project
- [x] Install additional dependencies
- [x] Create landing page components
- [x] Configure smooth scrolling and animations
- [x] Test and run the project

## Project Requirements
- Premium, professional design reflecting data engineering/tech industry
- Smooth scrolling and Framer Motion animations
- Responsive design
- Trust-building elements (testimonials, credentials)
- Clear CTAs and conversion-focused layout
- Modern color scheme with gradients

## Development Notes
- Using current directory (.) as project root
- App Router structure with TypeScript
- Component-based architecture
- Optimized for performance and SEO
